column4: zcat[1] : How do you get it installed on such an old comp? Gnome is unusable on my 550Mhz AMD K6-II.
megaman123 no, if you want to give a user no password access to sudo , do sudoedit & add the line <usrname> ALL = (ALL) NOPASSWD:  ALL
Oh, right. I was basing my guess off how the LiveCD worked.
neither am I, that's my old debian thing before I got smarter
